review: I'm in love with Amazon Fire TV!! Set up was a breeze (less than 5 minutes) and the voice activated search works extremely well. As an Amazon Prime member, the access to free streaming of over 10,000 movies and TV episodes (like Downton Abbey and many HBO series) is impressive. I was able to access all 4 seasons of Dowton Abbey for free!!.....and that savings more than covered the cost of the Amazon Fire TV unit! I highly recommend Amazon Fire TV to all my friends and family :-)

review: Amazon really needs to play catch up on the variety of channels (apps) available when compared to Roku. Have also noticed that movies that I can watch on Netflix through Roku are not available with Amazon Fire TV. The voice search feature is nice and seems to be pretty accurate. I was hoping the Amazon Fire TV would be at least comparable to Roku 3, and one day it might, but I'm thinking about going back to Roku at this point.
